name: Further Than Ever
description:
Catch birds and open your mind in this short arcade game.

Guide your snake-like net, with accurate bendy physics, to catch multi-coloured birds as they move across the screen. Each bird caught legthens your net and reveals new facts. Facts about birds.

The soundtrack is written specially for the Further Than Ever and reacts to the gameplay, the music progresses and layers the further you get. It's the perfect game to chill out to.
